thread.title: Petrobras Fuel Distribution Unit to Raise $1 Billion From Debt Issue
thread.title_full: Petrobras Fuel Distribution Unit to Raise $1 Billion From Debt Issue - WSJ

author: Rogerio Jelmayer
title: Petrobras Fuel Distribution Unit to Raise $1 Billion From Debt Issue
text:
SÃO PAULO—Petrobras Distribuidora SA, the fuel distribution unit of Brazil’s state-run oil firm Petróleo Brasileiro SA, or Petrobras, is planning to raise 3.5 billion reais ($1 billion) from the issue of local bonds.
Petrobras Distribuidora, which operates under the brand name of BR Distribuidora, will raise the cash via debentures issue. It didn't unveil the due date of the issue or other financial terms. Banco Itau BBA is... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
